text: Dănuț Grecu (26 September 1950 – 13 December 2024) was a Romanian artistic gymnast who specialised in rings. He was born in Bucharest, Romania. He won a bronze medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Grecu died on 12 December 2024, at the age of 74. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1950 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Romania Category:Romanian gymnasts Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest
title: Dan Grecu
